workflow.description: Flujo de aprobación para la solicitudes de compra
workflow.name: WIN - Aprobación de Solicitudes

initcondition.formula: isEmpty("Entity (Employee):Supervisor") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Entity (Employee):Purchase Approver") = 'T' AND "Estimated Total" > "Entity (Employee):Purchase Limit"

sendemailaction.body:
Solicitud de aprobación

Tienes una solicitud de compra pendiente de aprobar.

Puedes iniciar sesión en NetSuite para ejecutar la aprobación

Saludos
sendemailaction.subject: Solicitud de Compra pendiente de aprobar

initcondition.formula: isEmpty("Next Approver") = 'F' AND "Approval Status" IN ("Approval Status1") AND isEmpty("User") = 'F'

workflowstatecustomfield.description: Purchase Approval Workflow : Entry Workflow State Field
workflowstatecustomfield.label: next Approver

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Pending Approval Workflow State
workflowstate.name: Pending Approval

initcondition.formula: "Approval Status" IN ("Approval Status1") AND "Next Approver" IN ("Current User")
"Approval Status" IN ("Approval Status1") AND "Next Approver" IN ("Current User")

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Set Next Approver Workflow State.
workflowstate.name: Set Next Approver

initcondition.formula: "Next Approver:Purchase Approval Limit" < "Estimated Total" AND isEmpty("Next Approver:Purchase Approver") = 'F'
isEmpty("Next Approver:Supervisor") = 'F' AND "Next Approver:Purchase Approval Limit" < "Estimated Total" AND isEmpty("Next Approver:Purchase Approver") = 'T'

sendemailaction.body:
Solicitud de aprobación

Tienes una solicitud de compra pendiente de aprobar.

Puedes iniciar sesión en NetSuite para ejecutar la aprobación

Saludos
sendemailaction.subject: Solicitud de Compra pendiente de aprobar

workflowstatecustomfield.description: Purchase Approval Workflow : Set Next Approver Workflow State Field.
workflowstatecustomfield.help: Purchase Approval Workflow : Set Next Approver Workflow State Field.
workflowstatecustomfield.label: next approver

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Approved Workflow State.
workflowstate.name: Approved

sendemailaction.body:
Solicitud de Compra aprobada

Tu solicitud de compra ha sido aprobada

Puedes iniciar sesión en NetSuite visualizar tu transacción

Saludos
sendemailaction.subject: Tu Solicitud de Compra ha sido aprobada

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Rejected Workflow State.
workflowstate.name: Rejected

sendemailaction.body:
Solicitud de Compra rechazada

Tu solicitud de compra ha sido rechazada

Puedes iniciar sesión en NetSuite para visualizar tu transacción

Saludos
sendemailaction.subject: Tu Solicitud de Compra ha sido rechazada
